cards.rules_text:
Flying
When a creature you control with power 1 or less enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If this is the second time this ability has triggered this turn, put an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

When Kernel Hopper enters, exile target creature not named Kernel Hopper, then return it to the battlefield.
You may cast Kernel Hopper from any zone other than your library as long as a permanent you control left the battlefield this turn.

Vigilance
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, put its counters on Training-Sim Custodian.
cards.rules_text2: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

cards.rules_text: Whenever Stun Distractor or another creature you control enters, if that creature wasn't cast from your hand, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it.
When bounceguy leaves the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner's hand or pay {2}.
Return target creature card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Abilities of creatures on the battlefield and creature cards in hands cost {2} more to activate.

{T}: Another target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn.
Exhaust — {4}{W}{W}: If this creature isn't a token, create two tokens that are copies of it. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Activate each exhaust ability only once.)[/i]

Flying, vigilance
As long as you control another creature with flying, Quill gets +1/+1.
cards.rules_text2: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 2/2 white Bird creature token with flying. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one — 
• Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.
• Exile target noncreature, nonland permanent.
• Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 4 life.

When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.
Whenever you attack, you may pay {2}. When you do, target attacking creature gains first strike until end of turn.

Ninjutsu {1}{W} [i]({1}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
When this creature enters, target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

Ninjutsu {2}{W} [i]({2}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
When this creature enters, create a 1/1 colorless Robot creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

Ninjutsu {2}{W}{W} [i]({2}{W}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has +1/+1 and vigilance.
{2}{W}: Return Recursive Security Patch and one other noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in a random order.

When this enters, you get a gene counter.
You may cast this spell from your graveyard. As an additional cost to cast this way, pay {1} for each gene counter you have.

Ninjutsu {2}{U} [i]({2}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
When this creature enters, target creature becomes a copy of a creature on the battlefield end of turn.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Robot artifact creature token.
cards.rules_text2: Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.

cards.rules_text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} [i]({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
When this creature enters, choose one:
• Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
• Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

When this creature enters, create three 0/3 blue Tentacle creature tokens, then gain control of target creature for as long as you control one or more Tentacles.
Tap an untapped Tentacle you control: Tap target nonland permanent.

Flash
When Cascading Errors enters, exile target nonland permanent or spell. Its owner may cast it. It costs {X} more to cast, where X is the number of error counters on Cascading Errors.
Tap an untapped creature you control: Put an error counter on Cascading Errors

Flying
When this creature enters, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

Enchant creature
When this enchantment enters, you get a gene counter.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead create an X/X blue Illusion token, where X is twice the number of gene counters you have.
You may cast this spell from your graveyard. As an additional cost to cast this way, pay 1 for each gene counter you have.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell or activate a ninjutsu ability, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Exhaust — {4}{U}{U}: If this creature isn't a token, create two tokens that are copies of it. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Activate each exhaust ability only once.)[/i]
When a nontoken creature enters under your control, if it isn't a main phase, create a token that's a copy of it.

Return target spell or nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Until end of turn, spells with the same name as that card can't be cast and activated abilities of sources with that name can't be activated.
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. This turn, if a creature its controller controls would leave the battlefield, exile it instead.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
You may pay {1}{B} and return an unblocked attacking creature you control to its owner's hand as you cast this spell. If you do, return that card to the battlefield instead.

Ninjutsu {B} [i]({B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
When this creature enters, target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
If this creature would be dealt damage or destroyed, you may instead pay {1}{B}.
cards.rules_text2: Destroy target creature. [i](Then exile this card. You may play the creature later from exile.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Ninjutsu {1}{B} [i]({1}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever you attack, you may discard a card. If you do, return Repli-Corps Reject from your graveyard to your hand.

Whenever this creature attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Exhaust — {4}{B}{B}: If this creature isn't a token, create two tokens that are copies of it. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Activate each exhaust ability only once.)[/i]

When this enchantment enters, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, if it wasn't cast from your hand, target opponent loses 2 life.
When this creature enters, exile target card from a graveyard. As long as it remains in exile, you may play it, and mana of any color can be spent to cast it.
When Bloodaxe enters, put a menace counter on target creature.
cards.rules_text2: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. [i](Then exile this card. You may play the creature later from exile.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn. 
At the beginning of the next end step, put target card in a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

Target player draws two cards and loses 3 life.
{2}{B}: Put Recursive Data Torrent and one other noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Choose a number. Look at target player's hand and choose a nonland card from it whose power or toughness is the chosen number. That player discards that card.

Haste
{1}{R}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate if it entered the battlefield this turn.
If you would draw a card, you may instead create a 4/1 red Fist creature token with haste. [i](Even if your library has no cards in it.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2: 1,000 Blows deals 3 damage to each creature. Excess damage is dealt to those creatures' controllers.

cards.rules_text:
Clobbler deals 4 damage to any target.
You may pay {1}{R} and tap an untapped creature you control and put three stun counters on it rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

Enchant creature
When this enchantment enters, you get a gene counter.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each gene counter you have and has menace.
You may cast this spell from your graveyard. As an additional cost to cast this way, pay {1} for each gene counter you have.

Ninjutsu {2}{R} [i]({2}{R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
If a source you control would deal damage, instead it deals that much damage plus 1.
Whenever another creature you control enters, this creature deals 1 damage to target opponent. Up to one target creature can't block this turn.

Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
Exhaust — {4}{R}{R}: If this creature isn't a token, create two tokens that are copies of it. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Activate each exhaust ability only once.)[/i]

Haste
Whenever this creature attacks, if it entered this turn, put a stun counter on it.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 Robot artifact creature token. It gains haste until end of turn, and attacks this turn if able.
At the beginning of your second main phase, if an opponent lost 4 or more life this turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until another card is exiled with this enchantment.

Recursive Logic Bomb deals 3 damage to any target.
{2}{R}: Put Recursive Logic Bomb and one other noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in a random order.

When this enchantment enters, if it was cast, it deals 6 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature gets menace and haste.
Ninjutsu {R} [i]({R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]

Ninjutsu {2}{R}{R} [i]({2}{R}{R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Haste
At the beginning of your end step, if this creature was cast this turn, return it to its owner's hand.

Reach
{T}: Add {G}. When this mana is spent other than to cast a creature spell, you gain 2 life.

Trample
{1}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.
When this creature dies, create a 0/0 green Wurm creature token, then put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature.
When this creature enters, create a Forest land token.

• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

Reach
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
If this creature with one or more +1/+1 counters on it would be returned to its owner's hand to activate a ninjutsu ability of a creature card, that creature enters with that many additional +1/+1 counters.
Whenever another creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. It gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

When this creature enters, create a 1/1 Robot artifact creature token, then put X +1/+1 counters on that token, where X is the number of gene counters you have.
When this creature dies, you get a gene counter.

Ninjutsu {2}{G} [i]({2}{G}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
